Asian Disasters: Climate Change Intensified Ditwah & Senyar Cyclones: Study
Asian Disasters: Climate Change Intensified Ditwah & Senyar Cyclones: Study
Edited By
WION Video Desk
Published:
Dec 11, 2025, 13:49 IST
| Updated:
Dec 11, 2025, 13:49 IST
Asian Disasters: A new scientific study has found that climate change played a significant role in intensifying the Ditwah and Senyar cyclones, leading to increased destruction and loss of life. Researchers say rising sea temperatures and changing weather patterns have made such storms more frequent and severe, with devastating impacts on affected regions.
